title: Report Riot for allowing the surrender option
body:
I report my entire team if they quit. 

Only new players quit...

Why even play the game if everyone is just gonna quit every game Riot?

replies.body:
Some games are unwinnable and it makes sense not to waste time in a one-sided affair. Why would you torture yourself when there's almost exactly 0 chance to win and no late game prospect. It's just like in chess when people surrender after mate is inevitable in a move or two.

The only thing that bugs me is when a 4-man premade decides BY THEMSELVES to surrender. Even if I vote no, it doesn't matter.
